original_title: Love Is Where You Find It 2
overview: Three years ago, Walter and Nadia began what seemed to to be the most unusual relationship. Getting used to the 17 year age difference was a struggle for Walter. A big struggle. All is well, until Walter's niece moves to Atlanta and falls for, Tank, Walter's womanizing, best friend. Everyone decides to keep the romance a secret. But when Walter finds out he finds himself, just being Walter.
title: Love Is Where You Find It 2
